channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Three days of rubbish, 19th November
item.description:
In a giant pile to be ignored by Southwark Council who say everything is fine so shutup

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 43-45, Coldharbour Lane, Camberwell, London Borough of Southwark
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Gully cover and surround collapsed, 19th November
item.description:
Despite your contractor drilling out a gulley cover opposite 15 Merrilees Road they have done nothing to repair the collapsed cover and surrounding pavement by number 17 . This is a danger to elderly people who live in this road as it is a trip hazard
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 19, Merrilees Road, Longlands, Sidcup, London Borough of Bexley
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bayswater Road Park side opposite Lancaster Gate tube station, wooden bench has its arm rest missing, 19th November
item.description:
Location is opposite the Lancaster Gate tube station on Bayswater Road, backing onto Kensington Gardens. Bench has arm rest missing. Sorry no photos
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bayswater Road, Paddington, City of Westminster
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Horse Droppings on Brook Street, 19th November
item.description:
Brook Street now has a cycle lane and it is also used by the horses froma nearby stable and the area is constantly covered with horse droppings. Who is responsible for clearing this disgusting stuff. Also you will see another photo of leaves which have covered the footpath of Brook Street at the corner of Bayswater Road for a week now. Where is our council when they are needed

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brook Street, Paddington, City of Westminster
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bayswater Road north side 50metres east of Stanhope Place, 3 x separate taggings on white walls, 19th November
item.description:
Location is Bayswater Road north side between Stanhope Place and Edgware Road junction. Sorry no photos
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bayswater Road, Marylebone, City of Westminster

item.title: Overgrown bushes at the back of No 81, 19th November
item.description:
Resident reporting at the back of her property there is a fence and that is overgrown and hanging over onto her back fence & going onto the garage roof. This is an obstructing to pedestrians on the back of the close. Please could someone look into this
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): West Street, Northumberland Heath, Erith, London Borough of Bexley
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Discarded gas canisters, 19th November
item.description:
There are a number of discarded gas canisters on the lawn, as shown in the attached photograph. They have been dumped by a local low-life who has no regard for the environment, and are scattered across the grass and under the shrubs. Please arrange for their removal as soon as possible, as they present a safety and environmental concern.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Swingate Lane, Plumstead
Report on FixMyStreet
